body_html:
I just tried, and this worked for the equation in question. So that's a plus.

There still seems to be an issue in some other spots:
For instance, the output on the data shape output for 3dConv is getting mangled.

      .. math::
          D_{out} = \left\lfloor\frac{D_{in} + 2 * \text{padding}[0] - \text{dilation}[0]
                * (\text{kernel_size}[0] - 1) - 1}{\text{stride}[0]} + 1\right\rfloor

          H_{out} = \left\lfloor\frac{H_{in} + 2 * \text{padding}[1] - \text{dilation}[1]
                * (\text{kernel_size}[1] - 1) - 1}{\text{stride}[1]} + 1\right\rfloor

          W_{out} = \left\lfloor\frac{W_{in} + 2 * \text{padding}[2] - \text{dilation}[2]
                * (\text{kernel_size}[2] - 1) - 1}{\text{stride}[2]} + 1\right\rfloor

not sure if this is a multi-line issue, or it seems to be having trouble with \left

There were a few other places where it looks like there are some bumps.

So it looks like the options here are:

  1. Stick with MathJax, and restructure the pages so we aren't loading a giant page all at once
  2. Switch to Katex and root out the inconsistencies.

I think 2 is probably the better option, but it will require a bit of editing and proofing.

I think 2 is probably the better option, but it will require a bit of editing and proofing.
body:
I just tried, and this worked for the equation in question. So that's a plus. 

There still seems to be an issue in some other spots:
For instance, the output on the data shape output for 3dConv is getting mangled. 

          .. math::
              D_{out} = \left\lfloor\frac{D_{in} + 2 * \text{padding}[0] - \text{dilation}[0]
                    * (\text{kernel_size}[0] - 1) - 1}{\text{stride}[0]} + 1\right\rfloor

              H_{out} = \left\lfloor\frac{H_{in} + 2 * \text{padding}[1] - \text{dilation}[1]
                    * (\text{kernel_size}[1] - 1) - 1}{\text{stride}[1]} + 1\right\rfloor

              W_{out} = \left\lfloor\frac{W_{in} + 2 * \text{padding}[2] - \text{dilation}[2]
                    * (\text{kernel_size}[2] - 1) - 1}{\text{stride}[2]} + 1\right\rfloor

not sure if this is a multi-line issue, or it seems to be having trouble with \left

There were a few other places where it looks like there are some bumps. 

So it looks like the options here are:
1. Stick with MathJax, and restructure the pages so we aren't loading a giant page all at once
2. Switch to Katex and root out the inconsistencies. 

I think 2 is probably the better option, but it will require a bit of editing and proofing.
